title: God Speaks from the Storm
summary: God answers Job with a series of rhetorical questions, emphasizing His sovereignty and wisdom in creation. He asks Job if he was present when the world was made or if he can control nature, revealing the vast gap between divine and human understanding.

faq.question: How does God respond to Job?
faq.answer: With questions that highlight Job’s limited knowledge and power.

faq.question: What is the main theme of God’s speech?
faq.answer: That God alone is the Creator and Sustainer of the universe.
